QuestData.Title: Entangled Dreams
QuestData.Description: I sense powerful magic emanating from deep within the barrow.$B$BWhatever is down there weaves a powerful spell, entangling us within our dreams.$B$BI am still too weak, but your skills are quite impressive, hero. I can see why Malfurion puts his trust in you.$B$BGo and eliminate the source of this magic.
QuestData.RewardText: In my dreams, I saw the satyr's leader. His face was familiar, though I could not see it clearly.$B$BI pray to Elune that it is not too late. I will go to Malfurion at once.
